title: Azure Leroy: Recruiting a Jungler for Serious, Competitive Play (High Silver to Low Plat)
body:
Hi All,

I've recently captained this team, and for personal reasons can no longer commit to playing on a regular basis.
I played Jungle alongside these brilliant players in a serious, competitive team.
We're currently 6/1, just out of promos, and looking to make some serious improvement as we climb.

Should you be eligible for this role, you will play alongside:

LoyVadumee; a strong ADC with a wide champion pool. He has great synergy with our Support and is willing to do what he must for the team.
Chauvinistic; co-founder of the team, and the idiot who came up with the name, he's the new captain and our Support.
Colzy2; Mid laner. Camp him to win, enough said.
Bishopped; a very consistent top laner who plays very well to the meta. An asset to any team.

To apply, please respond to the following and/or add me in game, I'll handle the filtering process before trials.

Age:
Top 3 Picks:
Comms (Y/N):
Time Zone:
Availability:
Previous experience in 5's:

If you have any experience in Leadership roles or shot-calling, please mention as these will be of particular use to the team in its current state.

Thank you for your time, I look forward to hearing from you.

replies.body:
Age:16
Top 3 Picks:lux,vi,gnar. I was gold 3 last season and unranked ATM because I think that if I wait until the low elo people get placed and then play I will maybe get gold players instead of low elo unranked players playing with golds or at gold elo.
Comms (Y/N):Skype, curse voice, ts 3,mumble.
Time Zone:(UTC+12:00)
Availability:from 6:40 pm to 12 pm
Previous experience in 5's: I've been in many other teams with friends and it was mainly just for fun but we actually managed to get one of our teams to gold 2.
{{champion:150}}  :-)

Age: 24
Top 3 Picks: J4, Vi, ww
Comms (Y/N): All coms, from ts - mumble, vent and skype.
Time Zone: 10+GMT - Brisbane
Availability: All day everyday.
Previous experience in 5's: couple ranked teams over the passed few seasons hovered around silver - diamond level nothing too serious.

I have some shot calling ability but as i said i havent been in a serious team and im looking to join one. 
Im currently gold just kinda trying different things before i take to much seriously, with all the changes im
taking time to team stuff :D

26
vi yi hec. in the jungle.
yeah, skype TS and can get others.
NSW, but i play late nights mostly.
late nights, some days like weekends. but usually from 8pm till 2am.
done plenty. never had any team last outside placements more than 15 games. usually jungle ADC or support in teams. jungle when no one else can, ADC when looking to carry and support when im just a filler.
but i do all roles fine and know tons about the game.

was shot caller for most teams i went jungler and for every team i went support after a game or 2 everyone started just listening to me.

placed bronze 1 after 5-5, was silver 2 last season/preseason. hit gold promos and then my duo trolled me, not really into playing solo atm.
